data.message: Fix my account!!! Change my name on this account back to Sundance Wolf and STOP ignoring my e-mails and STOP sending me computer automated responses. #facebook fix this!

replies.message: Hi Erin. We're sorry you're having trouble changing your name. To help make sure that everyone uses their real name, we limit the number of times you can change your name. Please contact our team for help with name changes here: http://on.fb.me/1wbeNr9  -Elissa
To help make sure that everyone uses their REAL NAME? Who The Hell Are You To Decide What Name Is Real And What Is Not??? Leave People Alone AND QUIT BEING RELIGIOUS BIGOTS!!!!

Who are you to decide who should use what name!?????  I am a Wiccan, and have a Wiccan name that is part of my Wiccan identity...I should be able to use what name I choose without having my Religious Freedom taken away from me,,,that IS discrimination!!!  Oh and FYI....Silver Ravenwolf IS Silver's name...she has published under that name for the past 23 years!

I WAS JUST sitting,reading & thinking the same thing !!  "I HAVE ;A;      S C R EE N NAME for a reason !!! GET WITH THE PROGRAM !!! <KEYWAORD>{Privacy} lol          ;-[}    r"R"r;a;w;W;wr"R"r`,'.->.,.
